item.description:
Looking for a way to explore your artistic side but not sure where to start?
Sip & Paint is an exciting, creative class for both the artistic and not so artistic. Come out and join New Haven's newest entertainment spot for an evening of painting, sipping and enjoying the company of friends.
No experience required!

Bring your own bottle or favorite beverage & snacks!
All classes 100% novice oriented, no skills required, guaranteed!

Here's what to do:
1. Check our calendar and choose a date that's best for you
2.Register online or reserve your spot calling us 203.500.7352
3.Get ready to paint, party and be happy!
We provide everything you need!
Just bring your own bottle of wine or favorite beverage & snacks!

 

Tuesday

 July 10th
6:30 pm to 9 pm

 

  • Every month we will have a fun time painting a world famous painter, talk about them, paint, eat, and meet cool people.
  • $30.00

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Unleash your Van Gogh" Art Class Wine Party
